name: Lucky Now!!
description:
LuckyNow! is a carefully designed entertainment game, free to participate in the experience of scratch cards,spin, raffle.You can get unlimited rewards.Happy every day


In Lucky Now! you will:

-Happy scratch scratch, instant rewards.

-Spin game,One simple turn, continuous surprises

-Raffle tickets, Win the dream harvest

-Kill boring time. Play whenever you want


We believe that if one considers himself lucky then he will eventually be lucky in real life. So we delicately chose these gorgeous cards with pleasant colors and wonderful rewards to enhance your lucky feelings. You have every reason to feel rewarded and gather all the joy in our app. We wish you have a lucky day.


All you have to do is pick up your phone! If you play Lucky Now at any time, you will have unlimited joy and reward.


*Apple Inc. does not sponsor, nor in any way affiliated with Lucky Now! and/or the sweepstakes prizes.

*This game doesn't cost any real money.

*playing the game does not mean future success in the "real money game."
